full_summary:
================================


# Government Tender: Maintenance Dredging Services
=============================================

## Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number:** WS3915526513
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3915526513
* **Public Notice Date:** February 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 21, 2024, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

## Tender Details

* **Title:** Maintenance Dredging Traverse Nord, Bécancour, Cap-Santé et lac St-Pierre (EE517-232312)
* **Category:** Construction Services (CNST)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

## Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contract Status:** Expiring (Expiré)

## Locations

* **Regions of Opportunity:** Quebec (Québec)
* **Region of Delivery:** Quebec (Québec)

## Trade Agreements

* **Eligible Agreement:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (AECG) entre le Canada et l’Union européenne (UE)
* **Eligible Agreement:** Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Accord de continuité commerciale Canada–Royaume-Uni (ACC Canada-Royaume-Uni)
* **Eligible Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

## Contact Information

* **Name:** Gabriel Fortin-Harvey (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
